briefTitle: CTC in Predicting Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Among LABC Patients: a Single-center, Prospective, Exploratory Clinical Trial
officialTitle: Predictive Value of Circulating Tumor Cells in Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Among Locally Advanced Breast Cancer Patients: a Single-center, Prospective, Exploratory Clinical Trial
conditions: Locally Advanced Breast Cancer, Circulating Tumor Cell
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Predictive value of CTC in ypT0 ypN0
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with histologically confirmed primary invasive breast adenocarcinoma, anatomic stage T2-4N0-3M0 or T1N1-3M0 before neoadjuvant chemotherapy
* ECOG 0-1
* Adequate organ function
* Consent to undergo CTC analysis in vivo

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant or breastfeeding patients
* Metastatic or recurrent patients
* Uncontrollable infection
